title: Similar to "Platelet"
content:
Hello, I'm looking for the font used in the "Design&Designer" book. It's similar to platelet. Here's a picture and a link to some book cover

[http://www.pyramyd-editions.com/index.php?collec=2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212158/http:/www.pyramyd-editions.com/index.php?collec=2 "http://www.pyramyd-editions.com/index.php?collec=2")

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 12.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212158/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2012_2.png) | 8.9 KB |
author: Gab

comments.content: [Variable Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212158/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/variable/black/) is more similar, but it might even be something they have custom for their magazine. Essayez les contacter si vous parlez le français.
It is [VSV Melon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212158/http:/dev.typophile.com/node/32892) from Vasava. Quite extinct as it seems.
